item.title: Picking the Right Tool for a Remote Engineering Team
item.description: How to pick the right project management tools by trials and gathering feedback, highlighting the value of adaptive learning and experimentation in process improvement.

item.title: Building Your Initial Engineering Team
item.description: How I successfully built a strong initial team by prioritizing cultural fit alongside technical skills, ensuring the team could effectively navigate early challenges.
